inscription:
UL: 志渡の浦 {Shido no ura} / 玉取蜑 {tama-tori ama}
LL: 芳年戯画 {Yoshitoshi giga}
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print, ink on paper
portfolio: untitled series known as Sketches by Yoshitoshi (Yoshitoshi ryakuga 芳年略画)
title: The Diving Woman of Shido Bay
